content: I want to prove that s.nodup for a multiset s, because it cannot be of the form a :: a :: t. I saw there is nodup_iff_le : nodup s ↔ ∀ a, a :: a :: 0 ≤ s, so a lemma stating s ≤ t ↔ ∃ u, s + u = t could also be enough.
Thank you! I'm pretty sure I typed in exactly that lemma statement into library_search and didn't find anything, but I guess I must have mistyped.
